mutations.name: Mythic Godform
mutations.description: Transforms the creature into a godlike entity with extraordinary powers
mutations.transformationEffect: Creature's form becomes radiant and divine, emanating pure energy
mutations.specialAbility: Grants the creature the ability to manipulate reality in limited ways
mutations.effectDescription: Doubles all attributes and grants immunity to most negative effects

mutations.name: Mythic Elemental Mastery
mutations.description: Grants complete mastery over elemental forces
mutations.transformationEffect: Creature's form becomes a perfect fusion of all elemental energies
mutations.specialAbility: Allows the creature to manipulate and control elemental forces at will
mutations.effectDescription: Attacks can change elemental properties at will and the creature is immune to all elemental damage

mutations.name: Mythic Dimensional Lord
mutations.description: Elevates the creature to mastery over dimensional space
mutations.transformationEffect: Creature exists simultaneously across multiple dimensions
mutations.specialAbility: Allows the creature to create dimensional portals and manipulate space-time
mutations.effectDescription: Can teleport at will and create dimensional pockets for storage or trapping enemies

mutations.name: Mythic Cosmic Consciousness
mutations.description: Expands the creature's mind to encompass cosmic awareness
mutations.transformationEffect: Creature's form becomes partially ethereal, with cosmic patterns visible within
mutations.specialAbility: Grants precognition and the ability to perceive all nearby events simultaneously
mutations.effectDescription: Can predict enemy actions and automatically counter them with perfect timing
